page.title: 07MY HOUSE - A NEW ONE.
page.content:
My house is brand new.We moved in in January 1985.It is made of old bricks to fit in with the village. The inner walls are breeze-blocks and plaster.The house has sixteen rooms including built in cupboards and toilets.The rooms are two bathrooms,five bedrooms,one cloakroom with toilet on the hall,one study,one hall cupboard,one sitting room,one playroom and a kitchen.Also it has two garages.We have central heating radiators powered by oil and we have two coal fires.The garden is quite big.Big enough to play in.The village is much safer than my old village and has more places to play securely.
Peter Allan.
